abstract.shortdesc: Steps for replacing a Ceph RADOS Gateway node.

body.note: You must add a RADOS Gateway Node before replacing it.

section.title: Replace the RADOS Gateway node
section.p:
Perform the following steps to replace the RADOS Gateway node:
Add the replacement RADOS Gateway node. Refer to Adding a RADOS Gateway Node for the detailed procedure.
Remove the RADOS Gateway node. Refer to Removing a Ceph RADOS Gateway Node for the detailed procedure.
